# Dynamo Team Members - GitHub to Linear Mapping
#
# Format: github_username:linear_uuid
# Used by Linear Issue Matcher to:
#   1. Check if PR author is a Dynamo team member
#   2. Fetch Linear issues assigned to the PR author
#
# Lines without a colon are treated as username-only (no Linear UUID).
# Lines starting with # are comments.
#
# Included teams: DYN, DIS, LLM, DEP, OPS
# Source: dag_local_files/release_tools/data/team_roster.yaml
# Last updated: 2026-01-21
